title: Ping jumped from 40 to 200. Help!
body: Pls help me I dont know what happend, one day it was at it's normal at 40ping and now its 200. Pls help me to fix this.

replies.body: Your network might be having trouble maintaining a connection, and causing you to have this kind of delay.  I suggest going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which provides some steps to strengthen your connection.  That should get you fixed up!
